insights.title: Fast, stiff block — pace-friendly but stress-sensitive
insights.what_it_means: Quick contact time with sharp loading at front-leg block.
insights.why_it_matters: Can boost pace but elevates impact on the front leg.
fast_bowling_impact: Potential pace upside from a stiff front-leg block.
Higher impact load may increase stress on knee/ankle.
what_to_do_next: Keep brace intent without overstriding.
Manage spell length; add recovery between overs.

insights.title: Side-load at landing — can pull you off line
insights.what_it_means: Lateral bias at peak load during stance.
insights.why_it_matters: Can affect accuracy and increase joint stress.
fast_bowling_impact: Potential accuracy variability from off-line loading.
Elevated stress on lateral knee/ankle structures.
what_to_do_next: Cue neutral foot placement aligned to the target line.
Add single-leg balance holds focusing on centered load.

insights.title: Low force output — may leak pace late spell
insights.what_it_means: Lower impulse and peak proxies during stance.
insights.why_it_matters: Reduced output can limit ball speed and carry.
fast_bowling_impact: Pace may drop across the spell.
Lower peak output reduces release speed potential.
what_to_do_next: Add power steps focusing on crisp push-off.
Rehearse bound-to-block with strong drive.

insights.title: Heel-dominant strike — braking tendency
insights.what_it_means: Higher share of load under the heel at stance.

Control eccentric step-down to avoid heavy heel strike.

Control eccentric step-down to avoid heavy heel strike.
